message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. This is a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a price of $10,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your offer, but I'm still hoping for something closer to $11,000.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,500?  I think this is a fair price, considering the value of the product to you.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to stick to my original proposal and suggest a price of $10,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value to me.
